content:
Hello there!
Are you <color=#ca8f50>{me}</color>?
Thanks for making the journey here!

Mobai is at the Camp,
ready to give everyone an <color=#97c344>Astralink Life Guide</color>.
Go find him and <color=#38b6c5>press [Interact]</color> to learn more~!

If you don't see him,
you can <color=#38b6c5>use WASD to move</color> and look <color=#38b6c5>forward, backward, left, and right</color>.

I'm <color=#8AAB4B>Glenn</color> from Loomi Co.,
Nice to meet you!

Mobai is at the Camp,
ready to give everyone an <color=#97c344>Astralink Life Guide</color>.
Go find him and <color=#38b6c5>press [Interact]</color> to learn more~!

If you don't see him,
you can <color=#38b6c5>use WASD keys</color> to <color=#38b6c5>move around</color> and look for him.
